From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 American filmThe Fabulous FourDirected byJocelyn MoorhouseWritten by
Jocelyn Moorhouse
Jenna Milly
Ann Marie Allison
Produced by
Richard B. Lewis
Lauren Hantz
Starring
Susan Sarandon

Megan Mullally

Productioncompanies
Southpaw Entertainment
Hantz Motion Pictures
Distributed byBleecker StreetRelease date
July 26, 2024 (2024-07-26)
CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
The Fabulous Four is an upcoming American comedy film, directed by Jocelyn Moorhouse, from a screenplay by Moorhouse, Jenna Milly, and Ann Marie Allison. It stars Susan Sarandon, Bette Midler, Megan Mullally and Sheryl Lee Ralph.
It is scheduled to be released on July 26, 2024 in the United States by Bleecker Street.


Premise[edit]
Three friends travel to Key West, Florida, to be bridesmaids in a surprise wedding of their friend from college.

Cast[edit]
Susan Sarandon
Bette Midler
Megan Mullally
Sheryl Lee Ralph
Bruce Greenwood
Timothy V. Murphy
Production[edit]
In May 2022, it was announced Susan Sarandon, Bette Midler, and Megan Mullally had joined the cast of the film, with Jocelyn Moorhouse directing from a screenplay she wrote alongside Jenna Milly and Ann Marie Allison.[1] In October 2022, Sissy Spacek joined the cast of the film, with Bleecker Street acquiring distribution rights to the film.[2] In October 2023, Sheryl Lee Ralph, Bruce Greenwood and Timothy V. Murphy joined the cast of the film, with Ralph replacing Spacek who exited due to scheduling conflicts.[3]
Principal photography began in September 2023, in Savannah, Georgia, securing a SAG-AFTRA interim agreement.[4][5]

References[edit]


^ Wiseman, Andreas (May 11, 2022). "Susan Sarandon, Bette Midler & Megan Mullally To Star In Wedding Comedy 'The Fabulous Four' — Cannes Market Hot Pic". Deadline Hollywood. Retrieved November 5, 2023.

^ Rubin, Rebecca (October 31, 2022). "'The Fabulous Four,' a Feel-Good Comedy Starring Susan Sarandon and Bette Midler, Sells to Bleecker Street". Variety. Retrieved November 5, 2023.

^ Grobar, Matt (October 25, 2023). "Sheryl Lee Ralph Rounds Out 'The Fabulous Four' As Additional Cast Joins Bleecker Street Comedy". Deadline Hollywood. Retrieved November 5, 2023.

^ Curley, Molly (September 25, 2023). "'The Fabulous Four' now filming in Savannah". WSAV-TV. Retrieved November 5, 2023.

^ "How to Get Cast in 'The Fabulous Four' Starring Susan Sarandon". Project Casting. September 29, 2023. Retrieved November 5, 2023.
